name: Golf
overview: Birdie, bogey, par or eagle. The score is up to you. Game Boy Golf is 18 holes of realistic links action. Each hole has tricky hazards, so strategy is a must. Read the wind direction, check the distance, select club length, adjust your swing and keep your eye on the ball. Now drive it home. From twisting fairways and hungry sand traps to big water hazards and deceptive greens. Game Boy Golf is packed with challenge.
